experiences.description:
* Primarily responsible for positions: Pharmacist, operations executive
- Leveraging all hiring resources (local, internal, external) to increase the talent pool and its quality.
- Search and review CV to narrow down selected applicants.
- Interview and select qualified talent: Set up interview schedule and join interview, deal salary and offer process if the candidate passed the interview.
* Design poster, banner...
* Primarily responsible for positions: Pharmacist, operations executive - Leveraging all hiring resources (local, internal, external) to increase the talent pool and its quality. - Search and review CV to narrow down selected applicants. - Interview and select qualified talent: Set up interview schedule and join interview, deal salary and offer process if the candidate passed the interview. * Design poster, banner...

Talent Acquisition
* Primarily responsible for 3 positions: sales staff, shipper, operations executive
- Analyzing job description, set a plan for this job about leadtime, sourcing, budget, etc.
- Leveraging all hiring resources (local, internal, external) to increase the talent pool and its quality.
- Search and review CV to narrow down selected applicants.
- Interview and select qualified talent: Set up interview schedule and join interview with hiring manager, deal salary and offer process if the candidate passed the interview.
- Supporting new staffs: welcome on-board, introduction & training program.
* Working on Hris to create ID for employees
* Responsible for training new TA: recruitment process, working inter-department
